short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid of Netflix feminist propaganda

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of Netflix throwing at you categories like "Strong female characters"?
Just want to be a pride man watching male protagonists?
This extension monitors the titles advertised in Netflix feminist categories and hides them for you!

--- Extension is still under development, please report any bugs if encountered ---
